DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate dose-response , efficacy safety CP-690,550 eye drop patient dry eye disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II , Dose Ranging Study Of CP-690,550 Eye Drops In Patients With Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: Subjective symptom dry eye least 6 month Signs moderate severe dry eye ( corneal stain score schirmer test without anesthesia ) Women nursing , pregnant planning pregnancy study Participation study within 30 day screen visit Ocular disorder may confound interpretation study result
